jobs.modal.title.description: Jobs apply modal title, {0} will be replaced with the job name.

jobs.modal.step.description: Step indicator of the modal. {0} will be replaced with the current page .

jobs.modal.buttons.join.description: Join Discord button in the modal.

jobs.modal.error.message: Comhlánaigh gach réimse le do thoil
jobs.modal.error.description: Error when user did not fill all the fields.

jobs.modal.notice.message: Is tionscadal foinse oscailte é PreMiD, rud a chiallaíonn gur foireann neamhbhrabúis muid, téann gach síntiús nó airgead pátrún ar ais isteach sa táirge. Trí iarratas a dhéanamh ar phost i PreMiD, admhaíonn tú go bhfuil tú ag obair go deonach san fhoireann, ní íocfar tú as do chuid oibre.

jobs.guild.required.description: Title of the modal the user will see if it's not in Discord server.

jobs.guild.explanation.message: Le go mbeidh tú in ann iarratas a dhéanamh caithfidh tú a bheith inár bhfreastalaí Discord. Seachas sin ní bheimid in ann teagmháil a dhéanamh leat má roghnaítear thú!
jobs.guild.explanation.description: Explanation why users should be in Discord server to perform job application.

jobs.header.title.description: First part of the jobs page.

jobs.header.description.message: An bhfuil tú réidh le cuidiú leis an gclár Láithreacht-Shaibhir is mó?
jobs.header.description.description: The second part of the jobs page.

jobs.openings.title.description: Text before the available job positions cards.

jobs.benefit1.description.message: Téigh i dteagmháil leis na daoine taobh thiar de PreMiD.

jobs.benefit2.description.message: Féach ar ár bhForbairt agus Margaíocht.

jobs.benefit3.description.message: Ceadanna Discord Cumhachtacha agus ról ildaite.

jobs.benefit4.description.message: Le do chuidiú is féidir an tionscadal seo a reáchtáil.

jobs.benefit5.description.message: Tóg do chuid ama. Is obair dheonach í seo.

jobs.benefit6.description.message: Déan tástáil ar ghnéithe nua roimh aon duine eile.

jobs.success.applied.message: Go raibh maith agat as iarratas a dhéanamh!
